item.description:
Join us at Big City in Allston. We'll order some appetizers and shoot some pool. Kick back and relax and unwind after a week of hard work.

Look for us on 2nd floor. Afterwards we can get some bubble tea at the newly renovated Tea Infusions.

Hope you can make it.

Cost: $10 for appetizers and pool.
Time: 7pm until about 10 pm.

Drivers - can park on Brighton Ave or Harvard Ave.

By MBTA - take Green line (B train) and get off at Packard's corner (super 88) and walk 4 blocks to Big City. Or get off at Harvard Ave and walk 3 blocks down to intersection of Harvard Ave and Brighton Ave.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the group of asians shooting pool on 2nd floor...and I'll have a meetup tag on.
item.why: It's TGIF...come on by and join the fun and help the economy by spending some of that stimulus refund check!!

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: TGIF - pizza and pool
